name: vibeenengineer-lms
description: A modern Learning Management System with React, Node.js, and PostgreSQL

scripts.build: npm run build:api && npm run build:web
scripts.build:api: cd api && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:web: cd web && npm install && npm run build
scripts.prisma:studio: docker compose exec api npx prisma studio
scripts.prisma:migrate: docker compose exec api npx prisma migrate dev
scripts.prisma:reset: docker compose exec api npx prisma migrate reset --force
scripts.prisma:seed: docker compose exec api npm run prisma:seed

author: Vibeenengineer
